name: Food Products
description: All edible products including processed foods, beverages, and dietary supplements

mandatory.name: Microbiological Testing
mandatory.details: Testing for harmful bacteria, yeasts, and molds

mandatory.name: Nutritional Analysis
mandatory.details: Complete nutritional profile including macronutrients and micronutrients

optional.name: Allergen Testing
optional.details: Testing for common allergens like gluten, nuts, dairy

optional.name: Heavy Metals Testing
optional.details: Testing for lead, mercury, cadmium, and arsenic

blocked_countries.reason: Trade embargo due to political sanctions
Food safety concerns and regulatory non-compliance

label_requirements.details: Must list all ingredients in descending order by weight
Must include calories, fats, carbohydrates, proteins per serving
Must clearly state presence of major allergens

name: Cosmetics
description: Personal care products including skincare, makeup, and fragrances

mandatory.name: Safety Assessment
mandatory.details: Comprehensive safety evaluation of all ingredients

mandatory.name: Microbiological Testing
mandatory.details: Testing for bacterial and fungal contamination

optional.name: Stability Testing
optional.details: Testing product stability under various conditions

blocked_countries.reason: Regulatory restrictions on certain cosmetic ingredients

label_requirements.details: All ingredients must be listed using International Nomenclature of Cosmetic Ingredients
Clear instructions for safe use and application
Any necessary safety warnings or precautions

name: Dairy Products
description: Milk, cheese, yogurt, and other dairy-derived products

mandatory.name: Pathogen Testing
mandatory.details: Testing for Salmonella, Listeria, E. coli

label_requirements.details: Must indicate if product is pasteurized or raw
Clear instructions for refrigeration and shelf life

name: Meat and Poultry
description: Fresh, frozen, and processed meat and poultry products

mandatory.name: Pathogen Testing
mandatory.details: Testing for Salmonella, E. coli O157:H7, Campylobacter

mandatory.name: Veterinary Drug Residue Testing
mandatory.details: Ensuring compliance with maximum residue limits

blocked_countries.reason: Disease outbreaks and food safety concerns

label_requirements.details: Must clearly state where the animal was raised and processed

name: Fresh Produce
description: Fruits, vegetables, and other unprocessed plant-based foods

mandatory.name: Pesticide Residue Testing
mandatory.details: Ensuring compliance with maximum residue limits for pesticides

mandatory.name: Heavy Metal Screening
mandatory.details: Testing for lead, cadmium, arsenic in soil and produce

optional.name: Nutrient Analysis
optional.details: Verification of vitamin and mineral content

label_requirements.details: If applicable, organic certification logo and details

name: Beverages
description: Non-alcoholic and alcoholic drinks, including juices, sodas, and spirits

mandatory.name: Microbiological Stability Testing
mandatory.details: Ensuring product stability and absence of spoilage organisms

optional.name: Alcohol Content Verification
optional.details: For alcoholic beverages, verification of ABV

blocked_countries.reason: Religious and cultural restrictions on alcohol

label_requirements.details: For non-alcoholic beverages, standard nutritional information
For alcoholic beverages, legal age consumption warning
